summary: Call this API to get budget suggestion for product ads creation
description: Call this API to get budget suggestion for product ads creation

query.name: reference_id
query.description: A random string used to prevent duplicate ads. If an ads is created successfully, subsequent requests using the same reference id will fail - in this case, a new one must be generated. Use the same string for calling suggestion/recommendation API before the actual request to create an ads.

request_examples.code:
<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, array(
  CURLOPT_URL => 'https://partner.test.shopeemobile.com/api/v2/ads/get_product_recommended_roi_target?access_token=access_token&item_id=112233&partner_id=partner_id&reference_id=asdf-1234-qwerty&shop_id=shop_id&sign=sign&timestamp=timestamp',
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => '',
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 0,
  CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION => true,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => 'GET',
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => array(
    'Content-Type: application/json'
  ),
));

$response = curl_exec($curl);

curl_close($curl);
echo $response;

schema.name: error
schema.description: Error code, empty when no error returned

schema.name: warning
schema.description: This field is set if some data cannot respond normally.

schema.name: lower_bound
schema.description: Lower bound recommendation. e.g., value=3.5 and percentile=80 mean that setting an ROI target of 3.5 makes the ads more competitive than 80% of similar ads.

schema.name: exact
schema.description: Mid-level recommendation e.g., value=5.9 and percentile=50 mean that setting an ROI target of 5.9 makes the ads more competitive than 50% of similar ads.

schema.name: upper_bound
schema.description: Higher bound recommendation. e.g., value=10.8 and percentile=20 mean that setting an ROI target of 10.8 makes the ads more competitive than 20% of similar ads.
